  • VAR-SOM-MX93 : NXP i.MX93

VAR-SOM-MX93 :
NXP i.MX93

Starting from $39
  • Product Brief
  • Product Datasheet
  • Wiki Page

Energy-efficient System on Module / Computer on Module with integrated AI/ML NPU (Neural Processing Unit) acceleration for smart embedded systems, at an attractive price point.

The SoM runs on 1.7GHz Dual Cortex™-A55 NXP iMX93 processor with 250MHz Cortex-M33 Real-time co-processor, and delivers energy flex architecture, built-in security features along with industrial features such as dual CAN bus, dual GbE, and industrial temperature grade. In addition, it offers a wide set of peripherals and connectivity options such as audio in/out, camera inputs, certified Wi-Fi 6 dual-band 802.11 ax/ac/a/b/g/n with optional 802.15.4 and BT/BLE 5.3.

The VAR-SOM-MX93 is compatible with the VAR-SOM Pin2Pin family, providing maximum scalability and leading-edge capabilities; from entry-level i.MX6UL/6ULL platforms, through i.MX 8M NANO/MINI/PLUS and i.MX 93, up to i.MX 8X and 8QuadMax high-performance platforms.

For the complete Pin2Pin product list, check out Variscite’s Pin2Pin System on Module product families.

* The Pin2Pin compatibility depends on pinmux options; please verify the detailed pinout table in the related SoM to confirm compatibility is maintained in your specific design.

AI/ML acceleration, 2D PXP engine

Temperature range

-40 to 85°C

Product Longevity

2038

Pin2pin Family

VAR-SOM Pin2Pin family

CPU Name

NXP i.MX93

CPU Type

Cortex-A55

CPU Cores

2 cores

CPU Clock (Max)

Up to 1.7GHz

Real-time co-processor

250MHz Cortex-M33

Integer performance (DMIPS)

Up to 9,010

RAM

1 – 2 GB LPDDR4

eMMC

8 – 128 GB

Multimedia

2D/3D Graphics Acceleration

2D pixel acceleration engine (PxP)

Camera Interfaces

MIPI-CSI2, ISI (Parallel)

AI/ML

Display

Parallel RGB

1366x768p60 or 1280x800p60

DSI

LVDS

1366x768p60 or 1280x800p60

VAR-SOM-MX93[x]_V2_[xxxx]C_[xxxx]R_[xx]G_[AC]_[EC]_[TP]_[WBD/WBE]_[DSCM]_[VBT]_[X]T

MX93[x]:

Processor type:
i.MX 9331 single core no NPU: S
i.MX 9352 dual core with NPU: D

[xxxx]C:

CPU clock speed: 1700MHz: 1700C

[xxxx]R:

LP-DDR4: 1024 MB: 1024R, 2048 MB: 2048R

[xx]G:

eMMC: 8 GB : 8G, 16 GB : 16G, 32 GB : 32G, 64 GB : 64G, 128 GB : 128G

[AC]:

Audio Codec

[EC]:

GbE PHY

[TP]:

Resistive touch panel controller

[WBD/WBE]

WBD: Built-in certified dual band Wi-Fi 802.11 ax/ac/a/b/g/n + BT/BLE 5.3
WBE: Built-in certified dual band Wi-Fi 802.11 ax/ac/a/b/g/n + BT/BLE 5.3 + 802.15.4

[DSCM]

Default: LVDS on CH#0, DSI on CH#1
DSCM: LVDS on CH#1, DSI on CH#0 for compatibility with MINI/PLUS

[VBT]

Default: Standard supply voltage
VBT: Higher battery supply voltage

[x]T:

C : 0 to 70°C, E: -25 to 85°C, I : -40 to 85°C

Note: All options in [brackets] are optional add-ons that can be either removed or selected from a list of options

VAR-SOM-MX93 Evaluation Kits

The VAR-SOM-MX93 Development Kit and Starter Kit can serve as a complete development platform for both evaluation and application development purposes. The kits provide a great showcase of the VAR-SOM-MX93 connectivity features and performance.
